name: Ahold Delhaize
membership: Member of the ERRT and EuroCommerce. Moreover, Ahold Delhaize is a member of the Retailers' Environmental Action Programe (REAP).
goal: Ahold Delhaize is an international retailing group, selling excellent food and non-food products both via brick-and-mortar shops and the internet in Europe and the United States.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Information Society, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Ahold Delhaize furthers its interests in de broadest sense in Brussel via-Ã -vis the European institutions and other interest representatives. Therefore it is member of the ERRT and EuroCommerce. The company also lobbies on specific issues directly. Moreover, Ahold Delhaize is a member of the Retailers Environmental Action Programe (REAP)
